snippet: Lost amid the hubbub over Facebook's first public prospectus was the fact that another Internet-focused company, the antivirus software maker AVG Technologies, had priced its I.P.O.
abstract: Lost amid the hubbub over Facebook's first public prospectus was the fact that another Internet-focused company, the antivirus software maker AVG Technologies, had priced its I.P.O.
lead_paragraph: Lost amid the hubbub over Facebook's first public prospectus was the fact that another Internet-focused company, the antivirus software maker AVG Technologies, had priced its I.P.O., reports DealBook. Read more »

headline.main: DealBook: Antivirus Software Maker AVG Technologies Files for I.P.O.
